name: Dan's Workshop
subtitle: All my mods in one place
description:
Welcome to the official AltStore repository of Dan's Workshop!

Here, you can explore and download all of my free tweaked apps.

apps.name: YouTube Plus
apps.subtitle: YouTube Plus with additional tweaks
apps.localizedDescription:
This version contains YouTube Plus, YouPiP, YTUHD, Return YouTube Dislikes and Open in Safari extension

Features:
- Download videos, audio (including audio track selection), thumbnails, posts, and profile pictures
- Copy video, comment, and post information
- Interface customization: Remove feed elements, reorder tabs, enable OLED mode, and as use Shorts-only mode
- Player settings: Gestures, default quality, preferred audio track
- Save, Load and Restore settings. Clear cache once or automatically on app startup
- Built-in SponsorBlock
- And much, much more

YouTube Plus preferences can be found in the YouTube settings

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.

versions.localizedDescription:
YouTube Plus v5.1

- Added option to display mute button in player overlay
- Added option to display lock screen button in player overlay
- Added option to prefer stable volume when downloading media
- Added option to remove identifiers from sharing links
- Added option to download Shorts from the previews in feed
- Added option for embedding thumbnails into downloaded videos
- Added new tab support - Posts
- Added option to enable translucent tab bar
- Optimized tab bar for the new theme
- Added OLED dark keyboard
- Added progress bar theming: Solid color, Gradient color and Scrubber color selection
- Added option to remove Subscribe/Unsubscribe button under player
- Added options to remove Share, Thanks, Remix, Download, Clip, Save and Report buttons
- Added image viewer:
  * Show full-size post in image viewer:
  * Show full-size profile picture in image viewer
  * Show video thumbnail in image viewer
- Advanced Shorts elements settings is back:
  * Added options to remove Subscriptions, Live, Trends and Shopping buttons in paused states
  * Added options to remove Like, Dislike, Comment, Share and Remix buttons from actions bar
  * Added options to remove Suggestions, Username, Description, Source, Audio indicator and Follow button
- Improved downloading functions
- Improved YouTube Plus player menu
- Improved caption selection, fixed issues with Captions button in overlay
- Improved settings section for the new theme 
- Fixed random crashes in feed when SponsorBlock segments for feed enabled
- Fixed random crashes in shorts when legacy pip mode in YouPiP enabled
- Fixed crashes when tapping on Share
- Fixed option that removes 'Play next in queue' option in the menu
- Fixed bug related to stopping playback if auto-stopping was selected
- Fixed a bug that caused the app to crash when attempting to download a video
- Fixed shorts interface issue
- Fixed missing SponsorBlock segments in player bar and in feed
- Fixed Save or Share video sheet layout on iPads
- iPad mini-player style now brings back old mini-player
- iPhone mini-player style now brings back legacy iPhone mini-player
- More posts to hide
- Removed more ads
- Removed Old UI option since it broken completely
- Remove inline comment and Remove videos under player options moved to the player settings
- SponsorBlock enabled by default
- Special thanks section
- Now you can choose to not show Incompatible tweaks pop-up for the current version of YouTube Plus
- Added Korean localization support
- Added Polish localization support

apps.name: YouTube Music Ultimate
apps.subtitle: The best enhancer for YouTube Music on iOS
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
- Download audios, cover images
- Remove ads
- Background playback
- Interface customization: Remove tabs or other elements, enable OLED mode
- Player settings: Modify player elements, default playback mode
- Built-in SponsorBlock
- And much, much more

YouTube Music Ultimate preferences can be found under YouTube Music settings

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: YouTube Music uses Bluetooth to locate and connect to Chromecast and other devices.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: To take a profile picture, allow YouTube Music to access your camera.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube Music uses Bluetooth to locate and connect to Chromecast and other devices.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To save images, allow YouTube Music to access your photo library.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube Music to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This will allow you to invite your family into your membership plan.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To choose a profile picture, allow YouTube Music to access your photos.

versions.localizedDescription:
YouTube Music Ultimate v2.3.1

- Fixed downloads tab not working
- Fixed local network permissions

apps.name: Infuse Plus
apps.subtitle: Enhancer for Infuse app
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
- Pro features
- Background playback
- Double tap to Play/Pause gesture
- Custom seek time for Seek Forward/Backward buttons
- Custom double tap to skip time
- And more

Note: Infuse Plus preferences can be found in the Settings tab

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Used to discover nearby Cast devices
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Used for streaming media to external devices
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Used to discover network shares and Google Cast devices in your local network
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Please allow access in order to show iTunes videos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Used for pairing with external devices
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Used for unlocking your device when restrictions are enabled

versions.localizedDescription:
Infuse Plus v2.2

- Ability to add or play links directly, or batch import URLs from a file on the Home page
- Ability to batch import, export, or remove all links on the Direct URL page

apps.name: OrwellVK
apps.subtitle: A subtle shift from the familiar
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
- Download everything you love: videos, episodes, clips, songs, stories, and even voice messages
- Incognito Mode: Become invisible. Browse posts, read messages, and publish entries without leaving a trace
- Chats: Manage your chats with ease: send voice and video messages, graffiti directly from the gallery. Pretend you're typing
- Simplicity: Intuitive and flexible settings that are easy to personalize
- And More: OrwellVK is not just about settings. It hides even more features for your comfort and privacy

OrwellVK preferences can be found in the VK Settings and Side menu

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Это нужно, чтобы приложение могло найти умные устройства в вашем доме
privacy.NSSiriUsageDescription: Allow to use siri for message announcements
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow access to make calls, take photos, create virtual avatars, and record videos, clips and stories, as well as to use the TrueDepth camera to apply effects and masks
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Allow access to update number of your steps
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads to you
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow access to save photos and videos to the library
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Allow access to use data for VK Run
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Allow access to recognise voice messages
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow access to record videos and voice messages
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location is used when attached to a message or post and to improve recommendations for your news feed
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Used for authorization in VK Pay and VK Mini Apps
privacy.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: Allow access to read and edit events
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow access to search friends in your contacts
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow access to select photos and videos from the library

versions.localizedDescription:
OrwellVK v1.1.6

- Marking voice message and videos as viewed now also marks the message as read
- Added support for marking messages and media as viewed in group chats
- Added missing option to disable screenshot notifications
- Implemented a full-featured popup with detailed update information
- Improved API handling, fixed an issue where the option to mark certain voice messages as played was missing from the menu

apps.name: Glow for Facebook
apps.subtitle: Cleaner. Smarter. Yours.
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
- Download whatever you like — videos, images, Reels, and even stories
- Stay unseen. View stories and mark them as seen only when you want to
- Worried about accidental likes? Now you can relax
- Flexible, intuitive settings — all tailored to you

Glow settings are available via long press on any tab

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Facebook uses Bluetooth so you can do things like find and connect to devices and cast videos to TV.
privacy.NSSiriUsageDescription: This will let Siri help you look for photos on Facebook
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription:
Facebook uses access to your camera to do things like help you take and share photos, record videos, and use visual effects.

You can always change this in your device settings.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This allows Facebook to provide you with a better ads experience.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Facebook uses Bluetooth so you can do things like find and connect to devices and cast videos to TV.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Facebook uses your local network so you can do things like find and connect to devices and cast videos to TV.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Facebook uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Facebook uses access to your photos to do things like help you save images to your device, share and apply visual effects to your photos and videos, and to suggest photos and videos to share.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Facebook uses access to your media library to do things like help you play music and other audio from your device, and to save audio to your device.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This will let Facebook sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription:
Facebook uses access to your microphone to do things like help you record audio, identify songs, search with your voice and use audio effects.

You can always change this in your device settings.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Facebook uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences, like helping you check-in, find local events and get better ads.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Enable Face ID for quick and secure authentication on Facebook.
privacy.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: This will let Facebook sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allowing access to your address book helps you see the contacts you can choose to add and helps us provide a better service.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Facebook uses access to your photos to do things like help you share and apply visual effects to your photos and videos, and to suggest photos and videos to share.

apps.name: Flow for Messenger
apps.subtitle: A lightweight Messenger enhancer
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:
- Remove ads
- Remove stories banner
 -Remove 'People you may know'
- Disable typing indicator
- Read messages anonymously
 -Watch stories anonymously
- Loop stories
- Download stories
- Remove 'Stories' tab
- Remove 'Friends' tab
- Remove AI circle
- Require call confirmation

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This makes some features work with bluetooth accessories.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This makes some features work, enables location sharing with friends, and more.
privacy.NSSiriUsageDescription: This lets you use Siri to do things like make calls and read messages.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Messenger uses your device’s camera so you can do things like take photos, record and stream videos, make video calls, and create and use filters and effects.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This makes some features work with bluetooth accessories.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you do things like save to your camera roll and enables other features for photos and videos.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you play Apple Music tracks, add tracks to your music library, and more.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Messenger will use speech recognition to generate captions as people speak.
privacy.NSLocationUsageDescription: Messenger uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences, like live location sharing and suggesting local places.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This will let Messenger sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Messenger uses your device’s microphone so you can do things like record video with sound, make voice and video calls, and create voice messages.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Messenger uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences, like live location sharing and suggesting local places.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This will let Messenger sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Messenger uses Face ID to unlock the app.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This makes some features work, enables location sharing with friends, and more.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allowing access to your address book helps you see the contacts you can choose to add and helps us provide a better service.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Messenger uses your device’s photo library from your camera roll so you can do things like share photos and videos.
